title: Heart Shaped Scars
description: Lynnanne knows two things for sure. Parkinson's disease is slowly taking her life, and she failed to keep her children safe.If she had been smarter. If she had been a stronger person. If she had chosen better husbands. Lynnanne's life is full of ifs, and they all point to the same question... if things had been different, would her daughter still be alive?Heart Shaped Scars is an intense story of love, hurt, loss, and survival.
author: T.W. Vanderneck
